item.description:
Self-made in America - Mediocrity to Millions in three years

Developer Denis Keohane has been investing and developing real estate in Boston for over 20 years!

Come hear how he came to America with only $600 and in a few short years turned it into a Multi Million Dollar Real Estate portfolio- and YOU CAN TOO !

You'll learn:

  • Advice From a Real Estate Billionaire
  • Reasons You Need to be Investing NOW
  • Historical Trends, Real Estate Market Cycles and how you can benefit from them
  • A Few Fun Stories mixed in

Monthly Meeting

6:30 PM, Thursday, May 19, 2011

Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston, MA

Free for members; $25 for nonmembers

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association Monthly Meetup
